availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James R. Hewlett (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and attorney)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and attorney. Kentucky native. Son of Allison Hewlett and Sarah Hewlett. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 165B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 117.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 512A.
Find A Grave, "James R. Hewlett (1833-1896)," Memorial #42324501, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/42324501(accessed March 29, 2021).
